thread.section_title: Quicken Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quicken Loans | www.quickenloans.com | 3 of 287
thread.title: Kathleen Lindenberger
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by Kathleen Lindenberger

author: Kathleen Lindenberger
title: Kathleen Lindenberger
text: Even though we had to pay closings which were irolled into the refi , it still was the quickest loan I've ever had. two weeks ,maybe 2 1/2 , and it really helped my family get out of a financial bind . I recommend it to anybody who wants a refi and has all their information in order to do this . it will be quick and painless . You can submit all your information online so there's nobody you have to go in to see and you can talk to people along the way to help answer any questions or concerns .great experience!
